title: Google Maps directions lead a group of tourists into a stream, Michael Scott style
content:
Google Maps is a phenomenal tool for finding your way around unfamiliar roads, but in some regions, local knowledge prevails. Recently, a group of tourists followed Google Maps directions through a flooded stream.

moreâ€¦

The post Google Maps directions lead a group of tourists into a stream, Michael Scott style appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A mistake in Google Maps sent a group of tourists through a stream recently, showing that the machine doesn't always know best.
